attributes.action: Move England’s semi final to BBC to enable the team to make history.
attributes.background: England’s record when on ITV is quite frankly terrible. Even in this World Cup, their record on BBC is 3 wins out of 3 games whilst on ITV it is 1 draw and 1 defeat from two games (ignoring the penalty victory against Colombia). Parliament should intervene and rule that the game be moved to BBC.
